about_the_game:
You don’t need an analog camera to recreate the VHS effect. Just apply these overlays to your footage to add atmospheric dust, graininess, light leaks, and scratches.

In this set, you’ll find:

11 overlay effects

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Suite 2023 Steam Edition
detailed_description:
You don’t need an analog camera to recreate the VHS effect. Just apply these overlays to your footage to add atmospheric dust, graininess, light leaks, and scratches.

In this set, you’ll find:

11 overlay effects

The DLC set is compatible with Movavi Video Suite 2023 Steam Edition

fullgame.name: Movavi Video Suite 2023 Steam Edition - An all-in-one video maker: an editor, converter, screen recorder, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10/11 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 2000, NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8 and 8M, Quadro FX 4800, Quadro FX 5600, AMD Radeon™ R600, Mobility Radeon™ HD 4330, Mobility FirePro™ series, Radeon™ R5 M230 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Recreate the VHS effect with these video overlays: add atmospheric dust, graininess, light leaks, and scratches.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
